get.description: retrieve the world contracts ABIs with some config
retrieve all the config needed to connect to our services
Tells you if the World API is ok

post.description:
submit a meta transaction
Only bringOnline, bringOffline and setEntityMetadata are allowed

parameters.description: ERC2771 Meta TX object
parameters.name: request

get.summary: available fuels for the smart assemblies

get.description:
Retrieve all killmails that have been saved to the chain
Endpoint is paginated, use the `limit`/`offset` query param to paginate

parameters.description: Maximum number of killmail to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of killmail to skip before starting to collect the results
parameters.name: offset

get.description: returns a single killmail by the given id

parameters.description: Killmail ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Format of the response (default to json)
parameters.name: format

post.description: verify a Provable Object Datatype object

parameters.description: POD to verify
parameters.name: pod

get.description:
list all the smart assemblies currently in the world
Endpoint is paginated, use the `limit`/`offset` query param to paginate

parameters.description: Maximum number of smart assemblies to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of smart assemblies to skip before starting to collect the results
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Type of smart assembly to return
parameters.name: type

get.description:
Retrieve one Smart Assembly with the given id
if the assembly is a gate then the `.gate{}` will be filled
if the assembly is a storage unit then the `.storage{}` object will be filled

parameters.description: Smart Assembly ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Format of the response (default to json)
parameters.name: format

get.description:
list all the smart characters currently in the world
Endpoint is paginated, use the `limit`/`offset` query param to paginate

parameters.description: Maximum number of smart characters to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of smart characters to skip before starting to collect the results
parameters.name: offset

get.description: returns all the gate jumps that the current authenticated user made
get.summary: list all the jumps for the current user

get.description: returns a single jump by the given id that the current authenticated user made

parameters.description: Jump ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Format of the response (default to json)
parameters.name: format

get.description: retrieve one smart character with the given address

parameters.description: character hex address
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Format of the response (default to json)
parameters.name: format

get.description:
list all the solar systems currently in the game
Endpoint is paginated, use the `limit`/`offset` query param to paginate

parameters.description: Maximum number of solar systems to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of solar systems to skip before starting to collect the results
parameters.name: offset

get.description: get details about a single solar system

parameters.description: Solar System ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Format of the response (default to json)
parameters.name: format

get.description:
list all the tribes currently in the game
Endpoint is paginated, use the `limit`/`offset` query param to paginate

parameters.description: Maximum number of tribes to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of tribes to skip before starting to collect the results
parameters.name: offset

get.description: get details about a single tribe

parameters.description: Tribe ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Format of the response (default to json)
parameters.name: format

get.description:
list all the game types
Endpoint is paginated, use the `limit`/`offset` query param to paginate

parameters.description: Maximum number of types to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of types to skip before starting to collect the results
parameters.name: offset

get.description: get details about a single game type

parameters.description: game type ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Format of the response (default to json)
parameters.name: format

id.description: for now the Id is the jump Time as a UNIX ms timestamp
